Name: Debrah
description:
Debrah is married with 4 children. She is a permanent resident of Kansigyensa. Debrah is a farmer who looks forward to growing more coffee to sell and increase her disposable income.


As a farmer, she is disturbed by winds and soil erosion which makes the soil infertile. She is seeking a loan to buy mulch and manure to control soil erosion and improve soil nutrition. Thank you funders.
